Title: LDAP injection
Description:
Due to not properly sanitizing the LDAP queries an attacker is able to:

  • Gain information about existing LDAP users
  • Modify the login query, e.g. with a wildcard
ActionTaken: All LDAP queries have been reviewed and proper sanitization added.
Resolution: It is recommended that all instances are upgraded to ownCloud Server 6.0.2 or 5.0.15.
